title: Didn't get any LP for my win?!
body: I changed my summoner name, played a ranked game and i didnt get my LP for a win, also i got no grade, i exited post game screen cuz i was loading for a long time, i have a screenshot of that game , if any rioter would look into it i would be happy, thanks!

replies.body: EUNE is still suffering from this weird visual bug. AFAIK everyone is still getting their LP, the client just isn't showing it for some reason. Be sure to [**check the status page for updates**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune).
